sources.title: 2000 - The Giving Tree - Christina Applegate, Molly Ringwald - Best Friends, Dark Secrets
sources.description:
When friendship's reunion becomes a mystery's final chapter, nine lives hang in the balance of one shocking truth.
Emily invites her nine former classmates to a secluded mountain cabin reunion, only to be found hanging from a tree shortly after their arrival. Trapped by a rockslide, the remaining friends must uncover the dark secrets from their past that led to Emily's tragic demise.

Original Title: The Giving Tree (2000) | AKA: The Brutal Truth, Shaded Places
Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/Y0VREVKaSzA

metadata.Plot: Nine former schoolmates, staying at a secluded mountain cabin for a reunion, try to figure out why one of their friends and their hostess would invite them there and commit suicide which prompts them to look into the mysterious and dark past of their 10th friend.
metadata.Actors: Christina Applegate, Justin Lazard, Johnathon Schaech
